title: Analytics Catalog Query
description: Query objects in the Fusion Analytics Catalog using SQL. The Fusion Analytics Catalog allows you to define views of data stored in Fusion Collections. You must start the Fusion sql service before using this stage.

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

queryText.title: Query
queryText.description: The SQL query to execute.  Replaceable parameters will be applied before query execution using values pulled from request parameters and the pipeline context.

contextKey.title: Context Key
contextKey.description: The key used to bind query results into the pipeline context; if not set, the query results are returned to the client.
